resources.string:
Privacy Policy

Effective Date: 25 JUNE 2024 

Welcome to TipCal. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our app. 

We do not collect any personally identifiable information (PII) from users of TipCal. The app operates entirely on your device and does not transmit any data to our servers or any third parties.

Since we do not collect any personal data, we do not use any personal information for any purposes.

We implement security measures to protect the data on your device. However, please be aware that no method of electronic storage is completely secure.

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy in the app.

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at danielmommsen2@gmail.com.

By using TipCal, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
